actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 with respect to certain agricultural hand harvest laborers.

summary.text: Exempts children under the age of 12 years employed as agricultural hand harvest laborers from the provisions of the Fair Labor Standards Act provided the Secretary of Labor finds that such individual is employed for less than 13 weeks per year and is not employed during regular school hours, and (2) such employment is not deleterions to health or well being.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 with respect to certain agricultural hand harvest laborers.
